titles.title: Adoption Information Act
To require assurances that certain family planning service projects and programs will provide pamphlets containing the contact information of adoption centers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
5/5/2008--Introduced. Adoption Information Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require family planning service projects or programs, as a condition of receiving certain grants or contracts, to assure the Secretary of Health and Human Services that they will provide each person who inquires about their services with a pamphlet containing a comprehensive list of adoption centers in their state.
Directs the Secretary to prepare, annually update, and distribute such pamphlets to such projects or programs.
